availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Clay Howard (Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Indiana native.)

body.p: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Indiana native. Son of Samuel Howard and Louisa Howard, born in 1839. Married to Sallie Howard. Father of Elizabeth Howard and Eonisa Howard. Farmer in Carroll County. Clerk in Carroll County Circuit Court, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States(1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, District 1, Carroll County, p. 164b.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 15.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ghent, Carroll County, p. 2.
